event.title: was actually created by the U.S Air Force in June, 1070

data.event: The airport was actually created by the U.S Air Force in June, 1070.

event.title: May 31, 1970 earthquake, the 39th Tactical Airlift Squadron on rotational duty at Howard AFB, Canal Zone sent

data.event: After the May 31, 1970 earthquake, the 39th Tactical Airlift Squadron on rotational duty at Howard AFB, Canal Zone sent C-130's to Lima to support the relief efforts.
